text: jinnukalilum manusyarilum dharalam pere nam narakattinuventi srsticcittunt. avarkk hrdayannalunt; atupayeagicc avar pathikkunnilla. kannukalunt; atukeant kantariyunnilla. katukalunt; atupayeagicc kettu manas'silakkunnilla. avar nalkkalikaleppealeyan. ennalla, avaran pilaccavar. avar tanneyan oru srad'dhayumillattavar
